biotools.summary: Remove mutation predictions in masked regions Creates a GD file where mutations in the input GD that are located within certain regions of the reference genome are removed. These regions are defined as MASK entries in the mask GD file. Mutations that overlap only masked reference bases (and therefore do not overlap any unmasked bases) are removed.

bioschemas.name: gdtools_mask
bioschemas.summary: Remove mutation predictions in masked regions Creates a GD file where mutations in the input GD that are located within certain regions of the reference genome are removed. These regions are defined as MASK entries in the mask GD file. Mutations that overlap only masked reference bases (and therefore do not overlap any unmasked bases) are removed.
